description: The NASUWT calls for mass testing after Christmas break as the government delays students' return.
title: Covid: Teaching union calls for testing ahead of return of Jersey schools
title_page: Covid: Teaching union calls for testing ahead of return of Jersey schools - BBC News
maintext: "Although the medical advice is clear that schools should reopen as planned we are fully aware of the challenges that have been, and are continuing to be placed, on school staff," said Senator Vallois.
